title: Problem-solving errors study - mode of data set

A researcher presented participants with five simple math problems to solve. They were instructed to solve each problem and state their answer aloud to the researcher. In Group A, the participants were alone while solving the problems. In Group B, the participants were in the room with two confederates who gave the wrong answer to every problem.

Which of the following is the mode of the group with the confederates?

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
